Title: Relates to providing access to laptops for high school and higher education students and textbooks for higher education students
Summary: Relates to providing access to laptops for high school and higher education students and textbooks for higher education students; provides access to laptops and textbooks without charge.
LawCode: Amd ยง753, add Art 15-D ยง730, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing access to laptops for high school and higher education students and textbooks for higher education students
